name: Daze Before Christmas
description: Daze Before Christmas is a video game developed by Norwegian video game development company Funcom and originally released by Sunsoft onto the Sega Mega Drive in 1994 exclusively in Australia. A version was also released for the Super NES both in Europe and Australia. A North American release was planned however it was canceled. It is one of the last games to be released by Sunsoft's U.S. division.
